features.notes: 508 compliance and accessibility are still concerns for all of our products, especially where supported in the public sector. We should consider this in PatternFly.next.
Download and installation of our products still needs to be drastically improved.
Patching systems within a DMZ requires using 3 different products to complete. Provision server via CloudForms, send to Satellite to upgrade software, post config via Ansible playbook.
API management within Openshift requires moving over to 3scale if you want to bleed users over to a new verion. Would be nice to be able to do via OpenShift UI.
The BPM Information Architecture needs an overhaul based on field feedback.
Today, the add column wizard is tedious. It could probably be condensed to one form.
We need to come up with a good solution to differentiate between hosts and VMs in our iconography.
The field would like to see vertical navigation rather than horizontal.
